summary: The client requested to re-run Sprint SP-001 involving stories US-001, US-010, and US-015. The sprint planning architect, Mike, analyzed dependencies and rationale, confirmed preparation to update statuses to 'In Sprint', and sought confirmation to proceed.

decisions.title: Re-execute Sprint SP-001
decisions.details: Re-run stories US-001 Employee Directory Search, US-010 Mock Login Page, and US-015 Add Employee Profile after status updates for clean execution.

actions.task: Update statuses to 'In Sprint' for US-001, US-010, US-015 and save sprint details
Confirm readiness to re-execute SP-001 by saying 'yes'

backlog_deltas.title: Status updated to In Sprint for re-execution
Status updated to In Sprint for re-execution
Status updated to In Sprint for re-execution

risks.risk: Prior executions may have encountered issues such as resets affecting story states
risks.mitigation: Re-adding stories ensures a clean state for re-execution
